pool.name: Touhou_-_Love_Confessions_in_Gensoukyou
pool.description:
Pixiv image-response meme depicting Touhou characters' various reactions to receiving a confession of love, or what amounts to one.
Images should all come from those marked with the 告白幻想郷 tag on pixiv: http://www.pixiv.net/response.php?illust_id=7079159 The starter: http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=7079159

pool.name: Touhou_-_UFO_comic_by_Haruka_Akito
pool.description: Japanese Title: Artist: [[Haruka_Akito]]

pool.name: Reitaisai_7_Picture_Gathering
pool.description:
A collaboration between Pixiv and Reitaisai.
Artists draw a full-body portrait of a single character on a transparent background, in whatever pose they like. Images are to be a minimum of 1447x1447, 350dpi, [[transparent_background|PNG]] format.
Images used for this purpose are tagged as "例大祭7集合絵".
Info: "Here":http://www.pixiv.net/event_reitaisai7.php

pool.name: Dat_Ass!
pool.description: Specifically for pictures which present the 'derriere' in a particularly round and curvaceous manner.

pool.name: Clever
pool.description: Posts that show an exceptional amount of wit, excel in originality, or just happen to be rather neat for some reason.

pool.name: Nightmare_Fuel
pool.description: For posts that go beyond {{creepy}}. Those things that scared the pants off you as a kid, though they weren't meant to. It is something that was meant to amuse, entertain, or be only slightly scary to the audience.

pool.name: Touhou_-_Kogasa_comic_(arutana)
pool.description: Japanese title: "唐傘フォーム":http://www.pixiv.net/search.php?s_mode=s_tc&word=%E5%94%90%E5%82%98%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0&order=date

pool.name: Nice_Knowing_You
pool.description:
Usage when a character is or was in a preventable situation where the character dies or its equivalent. More of a Foreshadow. Usually comedic.
It is has less to do with 'You gonna get raped' and more of 'I have a bad feeling about this'

pool.name: Hot_Legsz
pool.description: Pictures of sexy, well drawn legs go here.

pool.name: Heart-Warming
pool.description:
For those images that leave warm and fuzzy feelings.
Things that make you go, "awwww!"
Posts that make you believe that Rousseau was right.

pool.name: Learning_to_Draw
pool.description:
A collection of images by various artists that help the budding artist with their drawing skill. These include [[how_to]] images with explicit instructions, as well as [[work_in_progress]] images, provided they give a clear idea of how an image came about and are helpful for someone trying to learn from it.
Also, images that have a [[making_of]] video are included here.

pool.name: Missing_thumbnails
pool.description:
For posts that do not have the thumbnails they are supposed to.
Note that a thumbnail is not necessarily "missing" just because it is blank or odd looking: [[transparent background]]s display as black, sometimes resulting in solid black thumbnails. The first frames of gifs may themselves be responsible for oddities, as well.
See also:
* pool #84 - Missing images * pool #279 - Missing samples

pool.name: Nurikabe_Kogasa-chan
pool.description: by [[yanagi_(artist)|Yanagi]]

pool.name: Touhou_-_Gensoukyou_Post-Office_(gensokoumuten_11)
pool.description:
Japanese Title: 幻想郷郵便局 Artist: [[gensokoumuten]] Artist's pixiv: Here
The local postman interacting with the denizens of Gensoukyou

pool.name: Touhou_4-koma_(iwatobihiro)
Charisma_Break
pool.description: characters that normally show lots of charisma, having it broken showing their complete opposite. Remilia Scarlet for example.

pool.name: Brother-sister_incest_(gotou_kenji)
pool.description: [[Brother and sister]] [[incest]] sequence, by [[gotou kenji]].

pool.description: [[Mother and son]] [[incest]] sequence, by [[gotou kenji]].

pool.name: Touhou_-_Chocolate_(ao_usagi)
pool.description:
Japanese Title: チョコレート Artist: [[ao_usagi]]
Reimu, Marisa, and valentines chocolate.

pool.name: Squeezable_x
pool.description:
Dumping ground for the former [[squeezable]] tag.
Pictures that make you think that you would have to be blind, stupid, and possibly dead to not want a handful of.
